author: Linda Givetash and Yuliya Talmazan and Kurt Chirbas and Sally Bronston and Dawn Liu and Leou Chen
title: U.S. reports 1,200 coronavirus deaths in one day as China lifts lockdown
description: Nation's top infectious diseases expert said he is "cautiously optimistic" that worst projections may be avoided "if we keep our foot on the accelerator."
content:
The White House has tried to offer some hope that measures to ameliorate the spread of the coronavirus were working at the start of what is expected to be the deadliest week of the pandemic in the United States.
The virus killed 1,264 over 24 hours in the U.… [+3233 chars]
